title: 7 Pack Long Sleeve Shirts for Men - Dry Fit Moisture Wicking Sun Protection UV UPF T-Shirts for Fishing Workout Gym
description: 【Value & Quick-Dry】Offering superior value over 1, 3, and 5 pack options, our 7-pack of men's athletic shirts, employ advanced quick-drying technology for optimal cooling and moisture-wicking. These dri fit t-shirts for men ensure you stay cool and dry during any activity or workout.

【Sun Protection & Breathable】BOOJO men's long sleeve sun protection shirts, rated UPF 50+, serve as a robust shield against harmful UV rays. As ideal uv shirts for men, they feature breathable fabric enhancing airflow, ensuring comfort throughout the day, whether outdoors or working out.

【Comfortable & Fit】BOOJO dry fit long sleeve shirts for men , made from 100% polyester. The 4-way stretch cuffs and hem, along with sturdy seam craftsmanship, provide a soft feel and flexibility for unrestricted movement.

【Various occasions & Ideal Choice】 Running shirts for men are suitable for various activities including fitness, outdoor hiking, fishing, beach vacations, and casual work life. Our fishing shirts, available in different colors and designs, make ideal choice for family, husband and boyfriends.

【Easy Care & Customer Support】Designed for convenience, swim shirts for men can be machine washed or hand washed in cold water. We recommend washing light and dark colors separately. Furthermore, we provide 24-hour customer service, ready to assist with any questions.
